timeline.message: squash! add flag to enable last value
add getconnection function for SQL driver
execute upsert when enabled and not row aggregation
add last data function to postgresql sink

timeline.bodyText: CNR entry corresponding to this PR should be added.
timeline.author: fgalan

timeline.message: list sinks where upsert function is available

timeline.bodyText: Maybe add a comment with the link doc/cygnus-ngsi/flume_extensions_catalogue/last_data_function.md ?
timeline.author: AlvaroVega
AlvaroVega

replies.bodyText: That's correct. In both cases this String sqlInstance is provided by the sink. In Postgis and PostgreSQL is handled as postgresql . This is because the driver used to connect to the database is the same one.
replies.author: IvanHdzC
